category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RICH_CLIENT_MARKER_ID
preference.preference_description: This preference is used for creating URL for invoking Rich Client. The URL created for rich client should be of the format http://web_server:port/cgi-bin/portal?-s=TCSession&-o=ObjectUID&-sid=serverMarker. The "serverMarker" in the example is read from RICH_CLIENT_MARKER_ID preference.
